      • getMediaThumbnail

        public byte[] getMediaThumbnail(ARDataTransferMedia media)
        Gets a remote media thumbnail. The ARDataTransferMedia object will be updated with the downloaded thumbnail
        Parameters:
        media - The media to get the thumbnail
        Returns:
        The thumbnail raw bytes if success, null otherwise

                     throws ARDataTransferException
